attributes.review: This app took 4 hours to download and I have perfectly good storage and wi-fi. And when I typed almost every word I said was auto-corrected, and it looks like the colors are red and blue but when you actually open it they are orange!!  Orange is the worst color and the color is so bright it hurt my eyes, I deleted it within 5 minutes of installing. Not worth your time. DO NOT BUY THIS TERRIBLE APP!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so bad and it made it Smokey. I had to get a hole new phone bc of this app. It started to play this werid sound  and it would not stop. Then out of no where it started to download random apps that I did NOT download.🙄 it’s would also turn my phone off at random times when I downloaded this app all I have to say is DO NOT GET THIS APP PLS IT WILL RUIN YOUR PHONE AND ITS HORRIBLE.😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: DONT USE THIS APP

attributes.review: I am SO disappointed with this app. Not only did it take nearly 6 hours to download when I have perfectly good wifi at home, I was unable to download anything else during the process!! Once it finished downloading I opened it and to my surprise it wouldn’t even load! This app should not even be on the app store.
attributes.title: Very disappointed.

attributes.review: Most of the events sent up do date it seems as if informing the public is a ladt resort for the trip company as much as I don’t like to get political I think even affiliating with this app is a horrible idea I they also need your name and location when you first download with no reason why they even need it horrible horrible horrible
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is so bad and glitchy it should be taken off the App Store it’s useless and if he’s going to try to get me to be convinced he should at least try harder and ,better instead, not run for president and get out of office. It’s been terrible with him around and now he has an app it makes it even worse that I have to see it in the App Store
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible. It kept asking for very personal information and took forever to download. But once I gave them all the stuff they needed, everything was super glitchy and extremely slow. I’m pretty sure this app had more than two viruses and I regret even downloading it in the first place.
attributes.title: Disappointment

attributes.review: This was terrible first it took forever to download then when I opened the app it began to make my phone glitch. I thought it was my phone at first but I even got a new phone and it still glitched. But it probably worked out for the best because the only reason I got it is to see what idiotic things the president was doing next. So 1 star.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I shouldn’t even give this app a “one star review” this app gave me carpal tunnel syndrome trying to use it. I spent 30 hours trying to download and once i got it my phone got a virus so i am leaving this review on my LAPTOP this app is a mistake waiting to happen. Plus i’m not sure why you need it, it has no uses, you get this and you get life problems.
attributes.title: Don’t Recommend

attributes.review: The app is TERRIBLEEEE it almost made me die 😨 I was walking and the app all of a sudden said, “My name is Donald Trump and I hide in a bunker!” And then I tripped on a stick 😡👊🏽👊🏽 And to think that a racist pedo could make an app- shame shame 😤 I’d also like to add that the app made my phone walk into my closet and started talking to me in the middle of the night! I opened the closet and the orange dude was standing right there! I am flabbergasted 😪😡😤👊🏽👊🏽👊🏽👊🏽👊🏽
attributes.title: ✨Bunker Boy ✨🧚🏽‍♂️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause my friend wanted me to but when I went in to the app it completely turned off my phone I kept trying to get into it like two more times but same thing and now it does that often whenever I’m doing something else on my phone I had to buy another phone
attributes.title: Made phone glitch
